resp: Here's a detailed 4-day sightseeing trip plan for your family from Kathmandu to the Great Wall of China, designed with a high budget for comfort and convenience. Enjoy exploring iconic attractions and comfortable stays!

tripPlan.overview: A luxurious 4-day sightseeing family trip from Kathmandu to Beijing, China, focusing on the Great Wall and other iconic landmarks with premium accommodations and seamless travel.

days.title: Arrival in Beijing & City Exploration
days.description: Fly from Kathmandu to Beijing, check-in at a luxury hotel, and explore Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City.

places.name: Tiananmen Square
places.notes: Best visited early morning to avoid crowds.

places.name: Forbidden City
places.notes: Buy tickets online in advance to skip the queue.

days.title: Great Wall of China at Mutianyu
days.description: Full day excursion to the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall with cable car rides and scenic views.

places.name: Great Wall at Mutianyu
places.notes: Take the cable car up and toboggan down for a fun experience.

days.title: Summer Palace & Temple of Heaven
days.description: Visit the serene Summer Palace gardens and the historic Temple of Heaven to experience Chinese imperial culture and architecture.

places.name: Summer Palace
places.notes: Opt for a boat ride on Kunming Lake.

places.name: Temple of Heaven
places.notes: Great spot to see locals practicing Tai Chi.

days.title: Leisure & Departure
days.description: Relax at your hotel or do some luxury shopping at Wangfujing Street before your flight back to Kathmandu.

places.name: Wangfujing Street
places.notes: Famous for local snacks and shopping.
